column4: Get that gag off or stop talking, you're driving me nuts.
What's up doc?
What's up nurse?
Hey, it's the new nurse!
Yo DialogPlayerName.  You got in trouble again?  Do you need anything?
Hey DialogPlayerName.  What do you want?
Hey girls!  (She looks around the meeting room for approval.)  It's the new patient.
What do you want?
I'm surprised you don't know, I'm DialogCharacterName.  I'm the girl you talk to if you need something.
I'm listening.  What do you need?
You should know me, I'm DialogCharacterName.  I'm the best patient around.  (She smirks.)
I can see that you need help, but what's in there for me?  Give me $10 and I'll help you out.
(She shakes her head no.)
It is?  (She thinks.)  Look!  A patient is trying to escape!  (She points behind you.)
I'll never join that program.  That stupid machine is brainwashing sane girls.
(She gets angry.)  Oh, hell no!  I was forced into it!  Selected by that piece of junk.
This is bullshit!  (She gets a strong shock and calms down.)  I'm sorry GGTS!  We will speak about something else.
What do you need?  A smoke?  A vibrator?  Some help with a jacket?  I'm here for you, and your money.
Sure, the price is $1 per smoke, do you want one?
I have a vibrating wand I can sell you.  It's used and it's not cheap, it goes for $80.  Do you want it?
I have a bunch of hairpins from one of the nurses. They're pretty hard to come by, though. It'll cost $40 for a pair.

column3: I want to get out of here.
column4: I can't help you there.  You can always try to fight your way out, but you'll get in trouble later.
Forget it girl.  I'm here to do business, not to struggle.
Bondage is free but freedom has a price.  How tight do you want it?
Alright.  You know where to find me if you need something else.
(You smoke with her for a while, it's kind of relaxing.)  Anything else you need?
Whatever!  Anything else you need?
(She sells you the used vibrating wand and grins.)  Have fun!  I'm sure you'll get popular with that toy.

column3: No way!  $80 for a used vibrator!
column4: Don't take it then.  I'm sure you'll come crawling back later to get it.
(She gives you a pair of hairpins you can use as lockpicks.)  Don't get yourself in too much trouble.
Whatever!  Anything else you need?

column3: Can you do it for free?
column4: No way.  You pay or you stay like that.
It's a pleasure to do business with you.  (She releases you and smirks.)  Anything else you need?
Stop begging.  You pay or you stay like that.
Sucker!  (She runs like hell and disappears in the halls.)
Sucker!  (She runs like hell and disappears in the halls.)
Catch me then!  (She runs like hell and disappears in the halls.)
Chicken!  (She uses a few items on you and makes chicken sounds.)
Alright!  (She uses some items on you and smirks.)

column3: I can take it.  Do your worst.
column4: Enjoy your struggling.  (She uses lots of items on you and grins.)
Whatever!  Anything else you need?
Yeah, that stupid machine ran some kind of algorithm and I was selected.  Now I need to say: "I'm a good girl." like a robot.
I won't calm down!  I can't stand saying: "I'm a good girl.".  Good girl my ass!
Fucking piece of computer junk.  I will smash it to the ground.  I can't stand saying: "I'm a good girl.".  Good girl my ass!
(She calms down.)  Yeah!  So, what's up?

column3: The AI wants to condition you.
column4: It won't work!  But still, that GGTS stuff is dangerous.

column3: But you're such a good girl.  (Laugh.)
column4: Fuck you!  Let's talk about something else.
You've been brainwashed girl.  Let's talk about something else.

column3: That machine is going too far.
column4: Damn right!  That GGTS stuff is dangerous.
(She calms down.)  Yeah!  So, what's up?
(She whispers.)  Everyone is joining GGTS.  Soon that computer will take over the asylum.  We must stop it before it's too late.
(She nods and whispers.)  Everyone is joining GGTS.  The computer will take over the asylum.  We must stop it before it's too late.
Think what you want, but that fucking AI is bad.  Let's talk about something else.
(She calms down.)  Yeah!  So, what's up?
You've been brainwashed girl.  Let's talk about something else.
How the hell do I know?  You have a plan?
(She calms down.)  Yeah!  So, what's up?
Think fast before we all become slaves to that machine.

column3: Could we use the minutes currency somehow?
column4: (She ponders.)  If we have enough minutes, maybe we could have a close access to break the data server and get out.
Find one before we all become slaves to that machine.
Get lost then.

column3: How many minutes would that require?
column4: (She thinks some more.)  It won't be easy.  At least three hundred.
(She sighs.)  The hell if I know.

column3: How many minutes de you have?
column4: (She laughs.)  None!  Are you surprised?  I'm done serving that stupid robot.
Ok, this is worth a try.  Let's go do GGTS and we'll use your minutes to get close to the machine.

column3: I don't have three hundred minutes.
column4: Forget it then, we're stuck unless you can get the minutes.
(She sighs.)  The hell if I know.

column3: Let's do it!  (Try to break GGTS to leave it.)
column4: (You both do GGTS and you use your minutes to get very close to the server while she distracts the cameras.)
(She pouts.)  Fine!  Think about it all you want.
(You use your futuristic heels to smash the database server to pieces, hoping all data will be lost.)
(Your restraints deactivate as you both run away from the asylum.   You can see blinking red lights and hear alarms everywhere.)
(From your hiding position, you see that they will rebuild GGTS from scratch and reopen the asylum later.  She cheers silently.)
(She nods.)  I think we're good.  Let's hope that stupid AI will not remember us.
(She gives you a hug.)  Yeah!  That was fucking scary.  Well done sister.
I'm sure they will reopen soon, but let's enjoy our victory for now.
I'll find a place to get drunk and celebrate.  See you later!
